import React from "react"; import { NavLink, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { useAuth } from "../../context/AuthContext"; // Adjust the path as necessary import styles from "../../styles/Navbar.module.css"; // Import the CSS module import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faArrowDown } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; // Import the download icon import { faArrowUp } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; // Import the download icon const Navbar = () => { const { user, logout } = useAuth(); // Access user and logout function from Auth context const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleLogout = () => { logout(); // Call the logout function from the Auth context navigate("/login"); // Redirect to the login page }; return (
